trans-unit.source: Controls the strictness of the code generated by the common language runtime's just-in-time (JIT) compiler.
trans-unit.target: 控制由 Common Language Runtime 的 Just-In-Time (JIT) 編譯器所產生之程式碼的嚴謹度。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute> attribute to assemblies to specify assembly compilation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute>屬性來指定組件編譯參數的組件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations> enumeration to specify compilation options.
This attribute is ignored in version 1.0 of the Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.NET Framework 1.0 版中，會忽略此屬性。

trans-unit.source: The classes in <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices> are for compiler writers' use only.
trans-unit.target: 中的類別<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices>編譯器撰寫者僅供使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute>.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute" /> class with the specified compilation relaxations.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的編譯 (Compilation) 寬鬆度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute> attribute to assemblies to specify assembly compilation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute>屬性來指定組件編譯參數的組件。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is ignored in version 1.0 of the Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.NET Framework 1.0 版中，會忽略此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations" /> 值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute> attribute to assemblies to specify assembly compilation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute>屬性來指定組件編譯參數的組件。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is ignored in version 1.0 of the Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.NET Framework 1.0 版中，會忽略此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the compilation relaxations specified when the current object was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 取得在建構目前的物件時所指定的編譯 (Compilation) 寬鬆度。

trans-unit.source: The compilation relaxations specified when the current object was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 在建構目前的物件時所指定的編譯 (Compilation) 寬鬆度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations" /> enumeration with the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute.CompilationRelaxations" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations" /> 列舉型別與 <see cref="P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute.CompilationRelaxations" /> 屬性搭配使用。
